CustomField.description: Most rollups are initiated from the child object and rolled up to the parent - however, if you'd like to have the rollup start from the parent and recalculate for all children when the parent is updated, check this box.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Most rollups are initiated from the child object and rolled up to the parent - however, if you'd like to have the rollup start from the parent and recalculate for all children when the parent is updated, check this box.
CustomField.label: Is Rollup Started From Parent
